attributes.action: allow parents of Primary School children to have the option of withdrawing them from Statutory Sex Education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parents should be allowed to have the decision as to how and when their children are taught Sex Education. The teaching of Sex Education in Primary School goes against the wishes of many parents for many different reasons. Parents should be allowed to withdraw their children from these lessons with the chance to be able teach children themselves when they are emotionally and mentally ready to understand the issues and consequences involved with Sex and issues related to sex.
